input.text: So, if you follow my GitHub page for this tutorial, you will notice that we have to complete some prerequisites first. In this video I've already completed those requirements. I also forwarded port 7000 on my Router. This is the port Vaultwarden will use. I added an A record to my self-hosted domain name server. I have added an entry in my self-hosted Engine X Proxy Manager. And I downloaded the latest sources. For a video about that you can click the link that's popping up right now.
